input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item keywords and item specification information.

Item specification:
Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector (iPad Mini 4 2015 Version)

Item keywords:
Tempered Glass Screen Protector Fits Perfectly for the New Apple iPad Mini 4
Smooth and Touch Sensitive Glass Surface. No Air Bubble Application
Anti Shatter Glass, Ultra Thin and Tough, Real Premium Tempered Glass with anti chip 9H Hardness
Protects your iPad Mini 4 and Prevents LCD Scratches
HD Clear and Anti-fingerprint Anti Smudge oleophobic coating
Feels like the glass you are used to on your phone
Slim design doesn't add unnecessary bulk

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector is a highly durable, high quality screen protector designed specifically for the iPad Mini 4.  Constructed from shatterproof tempered glass, this screen protector provides superior protection against scratches, fingerprints, dust, and other damage while maintaining the sensitivity and clarity of the iPad Mini 4 screen.  The slim, precision fit design ensures full functionality and ease of use while maintaining the original look and feel of the iPad Mini 4.  The Optionz New Apple iPad Mini 4 Tempered Glass Screen Protector is easy to install and includes a lifetime warranty.
input_text.Response B: These gorgeous glasses are perfect for all of your iced beverage needs. The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table, and the 16-ounce capacity is sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion. They are exquisitely designed to befit the most prestigious audience, and are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. The curvy shape and narrow stems offer a sophisticated look that will impress your guests. Lead-free. Hand-washing recommended.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_a: Clear and concise summary of the product.
label_annotations.factors_b: Response is about a totally different item to the one in the prompt.
